00023 #ifndef _CTK_STATIC_ASSERT_H
00024 #define _CTK_STATIC_ASSERT_H
00025 
00026 namespace ctk {
00027     template <bool> struct staticAssert { staticAssert(...); };
00028     template <> struct staticAssert <false> { };
00029 };
00030 
00031 #define CTK_STATIC_ASSERT(expr, msg) \
00032     { \
00033         class ERROR_##msg {}; \
00034         (void)sizeof(ctk::staticAssert<(expr) != 0>((new ERROR_##msg())));\
00035     }
00036 
00037 #endif /* _CTK_STATIC_ASSERT_H */
